TopicTitle: Does anyone like my Duna mission flag?

Articles.Content:
I made it to look like a target locked on sorta thing.

Is it okay? Because I made it in paint, on XP.

Come to think of it, I don't know how I play with 10 FPS max... That's a lot.
First thing I thought was 'redeye' till I read that it's supposed to be a target. But as Spikey said, whatever floats your boat.
A perversion of the "Lords of The Rings" eye. Intresting to say the least.

Ugly
